Zhenyuan Lu
Projects CV Teaching IE6600

Hi, I'm Zhenyuan Lu

I am a data science instructor and PhD student in the Department of Mechanical & Industrial Engineering of the College of Engineering at Northeastern University, where I am working with Prof. Sagar Kamarthi on machine learning in healthcare and disease diagnostics, e.g. cancer diagnostics, pain research, etc. I also design and teach the graduate course IE6600 Computation and Visualization for Analytics to prepare graduate students doing research, team projects and future career.

I am actively contributing to open source projects on creating user-friendly R-shiny app and machine learning implementations. When I am not at work, I am a photographer with my own studio taking photos included but not limited to human-beings, driver-only road trips, etc.
